item.title: address
item.description: The address-field contains the publisher's (or any other institution) address.

item.title: annote
item.description: BibTeX Field type

item.title: author
item.description: In the `author`-field, you can specify all contributors to the work you want to cite. BibTeX has several ways of specifying author names but expects in all cases a consistent and exact arrangement so that inaccurate information could lead to the unwanted output of the author's name.

item.title: booktitle
item.description: To cite an `incollection, i.e., a part of a book/collection with its own title, or to give a title to an article, part of an inproceedings, the booktitle-field is used to distinguish. At the same time, title contains the title of the book, or incproceedings`.

item.title: chapter
item.description: chapter

item.title: crossref
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: doi
item.description: `doi is used to store any DOI (Digital Object Identifier of the International DOI Foundation). DOI is a digital identifier that is intended to be permanent and unique. It is used, among other things, and mostly for articles from scientific journals. It can be used in article, but more rarely also in chapter, book, or inproceedings / conference`. This field is optional in all cases.

item.title: edition
item.description: The edition of a book, e.g. "edition = " Entering an ordinal number is recommended by default, and the first letter is usually capitalised.

item.title: editor
item.description: In the `editor`-field, you can specify all editors to the work you want to cite. BibTeX has several ways of specifying editor names but expects in all cases a consistent and exact arrangement so that inaccurate information could lead to the unwanted output of the editor's name.

item.title: email
item.description: Email includes the email address of the stated authors if you want to indicate them. It's not a common field and might not be supported.

item.title: howpublished
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: institution
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: journal
item.description: The name of the journal in which the paper was published

item.title: key
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: month
item.description: The month of publication, or creation if unpublished.

item.title: note
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: number
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: organization
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: pages
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: publisher
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: school
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: series
item.description: Coming soon ...

item.title: title
item.description: The title field is saved for the title of a work to be cited. LaTeX-specific writing, such as capitalisation, should be taken into account.

item.title: type
item.description: Within the BibTeX entry, the type field is used to declare an explicit type, i.e. for technical report "Research Note", or "Government Report".

item.title: volume
item.description: The 'volume' field is used to enter the volume of a journal or multi-volume book.

item.title: year
item.description: The year of publication, or creation if unpublished.
